tetrisjava

Class TetrisPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetrisjava.TetrisPiece

  • public class TetrisPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a Tetris game Piece called a tetrominoe.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Stephen Smith

        Rotates the piece to the right
        Parameters:

        Moves a piece down
        Returns:

      • moveLeftRight

        public void moveLeftRight(boolean left,
                          boolean right)
        Movies a piece to the left or right on the board
        Parameters:
        left - True if you want to move the piece left
        right - True if you want to move the piece right
